# Purchase of Refrigerated Floor Centrifuge

## Solicitation Information

- **Solicitation Number**: 22-58069
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01009341
- **Tender Closing Date**: October 20, 2022, at 13:00:00
- **Publication Date**: October 6, 2022
- **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Request for Supply Arrangement)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Limited Tendering
- **Procurement Category**: Good and Services (Category GD)

## Description

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) - Human Health Therapeutics has a requirement for a Refrigerated Floor Centrifuge (UNSPEC 41103906 / GSIN N6640B) for the purpose of laboratory and scientific research.

## Mandatory Requirements

* The refrigerated floor centrifuge must meet the technical criteria specified in Annex A of the solicitation documentation.
* The selected supplier must have a valid Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) at the time of contract award.

## Tender Details

* Bidders must be holders of Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with PWGSC.
* Interested suppliers must download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/C from [Buyandsell.gc.ca](http://buyandsell.gc.ca) and submit a response according to the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.
* The contract will be awarded to the responsive bidder that meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price.

## Contact Information

- **Contact Name**: Carol Cooper
- **Contact Email**: [carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:carol.cooper@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
- **Contact Phone**: 902-426-8259
- **Contact Address**: 1411 Oxford Street, Halifax, NS B3H 3Z1

## Trade Agreements

* This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
